{"id":831052025,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2Â months","timestamp":1666827764,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"135 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/831052025/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Concatenation of Consecutive Binary Numbers","memory":"6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\nuint64_t concatenatedBinary(int n)\n{\n    if (n == 1) return 1;\n    uint64_t curr = 1;\n    for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++)\n    {\n        uint64_t temp = curr << (int(log2(i)) + 1);\n        temp = (temp + i) % 1000000007;\n        curr = temp;\n    }\n    return curr;\n}\n   \n    \n};      \n//1 10 11 100\n//f(n-1) + f(n) % ()   \n//f(n-1) << (log2(n)) + n\n\n\n//11110000011011100\n\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"concatenation-of-consecutive-binary-numbers","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
